text:
Hi !
How can I iterate over a navigation menu in Hubl ?

Hi <@U01BPRUKCUB> please try to refrain from tagging folks on general questions.
<https://designers.HubSpot.com/slack/code-of-conduct#HubSpot-support-expectations>

This community is active and someone who has the answer will respond. As a heads up the majority of users are in the North American Hemisphere so expect a response within those general hours.

To answer your specific question  - we encourage starting your projects from the <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/building-blocks/themes/HubSpot-cms-boilerplate|Theme boilerplate> as we have an example of how to make a nav menu using the HubL menu function right here
<https://github.com/HubSpot/cms-theme-boilerplate/blob/main/src/modules/menu-section.module/module.html>
